overview:
Jeffery A. Thomas is an internet marketing and ecommerce professional with a lifelong passion for media, film and television. His current entertainment endeavors center around on-line media distribution and documentary film.

Jeff’s primary business and research focus is in the area of social networks and contextual media deployment.

Over the last 15 years, Jeff has worked in the conception, design, and development of websites and targeted internet marketing campaigns. He has launched several entertainment, ecommerce, billing, and promotional websites and developed an in-depth experience in traffic building and internet revenue generation. Jeff is a recognized expert in affiliate-marketing program design with a focus on the development and design of MLM based webmaster affiliate programs.
